name: Team Rocket’s Orbeetle
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: It emits psychic energy to observe and study what’s around it—and what’s around it can include things over six miles away.

abilities.name: Rocket Brain
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Team Rocket’s Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
